druth was a Sel√ªnite acolyte and the head cook of Moonshadow Hall in Yhaunn during the 14 century DR.
Idruth led a team of cooks who fed the inhabitants of Moonshadow Hall. She and her cooks were also responsible for preparing the feast for the New Moon Beneficence, the temples monthly charity banquet. The kitchen and the cooks fell under the ultimate responsibility of the senior priestess Velsinore, who handled all internal administration of the temple.
As of 1373 DR, Idruth served under High Moonmistress Dhauna Myritar. From Eleasis of that year, she served under Moonmistress-Designate Feena Archwood during the tumultuous events of that period, Her dedication to the feeding of her charges was only thwarted when Sharrans cultists publicly attacked the Beneficence feast she was assembling.
